title: Isn’t that the whole point anyhow?
author: VD
content_html:
This doesn’t exactly strike me as news:

Gordon Brown, likely to be the next prime minister, will deliver a speech calling for a “new world order” to combat global warming on Monday. According to excerpts released by the finance ministry, Chancellor of the Exchequer Brown will also say the United Nations should make the fight against global warming a core “pillar” of its international mission.

I always thought that the entire point of the “global warming” panic was to give those who seek a new world order an excuse to install it.
